嶺颪: (ねおろし) - wind coming from the top of a mountain

巌々とした: (がんがんとした) - craggy; steep (as of a mountain)
巌壁: (がんぺき) - wall of rock; rock cliff; rock face
巌巌とした: (がんがんとした) - craggy; steep (as of a mountain)

巌蔭: (いわかげ) - shade of a rock
巌頭: (がんとう) - top of a massive rock
巍然: (ぎぜん) - towering (as mountains do); of outstanding greatness (as a person)
川: (sen/kawa) - rio, rio, riacho; Rio, o... rio
川かます: (カワカマス) - pike (esp. the Amur pike, Esox reichertii); pickerel
川づら: (かわづら) - river surface; surface of a river

川を下る: (かわをくだる) - to descend a river
川を越える: (かわをこえる) - to cross a river
川上: (かわかみ) - upper reaches of a river; upstream
川下り: (かわくだり) - going downstream (in a boat)
川千鳥: (かわちどり) - plover on the riverside; plovers near a river
川原: (かわら) - dry river bed; river beach
川原松葉: (カワラマツバ) - our lady's bedstraw (Galium verum); yellow bedstraw
川口: (かわぐち) - mouth of river; estuary
川向こう: (かわむこう) - the other side of a river; the other side of the tracks/place where lower class people live
川尻: (かわじり) - mouth of a river; lower stream
川崎七分: (かわさきしちぶ) - type of baggy tobi trousers with the baggy part taking up seven-tenths of the full length of the trouser leg
川幅: (かわはば) - width of a river
川床: (ゆか) - (かしょう, かわどこ only) riverbed; (かわどこ, かわゆか, ゆか only) raised platform on the bank of a river for enjoying the cool in summer
川施餓鬼: (かわせがき) - (yoji) Buddhist services in memory of those drowned in a river; offering to suffering spirits at the river
川明かり: (かわあかり) - glow of a river in the darkness; surface of a river gleaming in the darkness; gleam on a river at dusk
川明り: (かわあかり) - glow of a river in the darkness; surface of a river gleaming in the darkness; gleam on a river at dusk
川楊: (カワヤナギ) - riverside willow (esp. rosegold pussy willow, Salix gracilistyla); (川柳 only)  Salix gilgiana (species of willow); (川柳 only) high-quality coarse tea
川止め: (かわどめ) - suspension of ferry service
川水雲: (カワモズク) - Batrachospermum gelatinosum (species of red alga)
川沿い: (かわぞい) - along the river; riverside
川波: (かわなみ) - ripples on a river
川流れ: (かわながれ) - being carried away by a current; drowning in a river/person who drowned in a river; cancellation/standing up/breaking a promise
川瀬: (かわせ) - rapids; shallows of a river
川獺: (カワウソ) - otter (Lutra lutra); Japanese river otter (Lutra lutra whiteleyi)

川筋: (かわすじ) - course of a river; land along a river
川虫: (かわむし) - aquatic insect larva (esp. of caddisflies, mayflies, etc.)

川螻蛄: (カワゲラ) - stonefly (any insect of order Plecoptera, esp. those of family Perlidae)
